```{r}

## Processing and Modification

# Check the type of each column
sapply(lizard_data, class)

# Convert SD.Female.adult.weight..g. to numeric
lizard_data$SD.Female.adult.weight..g. <- as.numeric(lizard_data$SD.Female.adult.weight..g.)

# Convert categorical columns to factors
lizard_data$Mode.of.reproduction <- as.factor(lizard_data$Mode.of.reproduction)
lizard_data$Foraging.Mode <- as.factor(lizard_data$Foraging.Mode)
lizard_data$Distribution <- as.factor(lizard_data$Distribution)

# Check updated column types
str(lizard_data)

View(lizard_data)

```


```{r}
# Check for Duplicates
duplicates <- lizard_data[duplicated(lizard_data), ]
print("Duplicate Rows:")
print(duplicates)

# Remove duplicates
lizard_data <- lizard_data[!duplicated(lizard_data), ]

# Manually Validate Ranges (e.g., SVL, weight)
summary(lizard_data$`Average.Female.adult.weight..g.`)  

## What to do about NA's 
```


```{r}
# 1.5 Identify Outliers
# Use boxplots to visualize numeric columns
boxplot(lizard_data$`Average.Female.adult.weight..g.`, main = "Female Adult Weight Outliers")
boxplot(lizard_data$`Mean.F.SVL.adults..mm.`, main = "Mean SVL Outliers")

# Optionally remove extreme outliers
# Define thresholds based on IQR (Interquartile Range)
Q1 <- quantile(lizard_data$`Average.Female.adult.weight..g.`, 0.25, na.rm = TRUE)
Q3 <- quantile(lizard_data$`Average.Female.adult.weight..g.`, 0.75, na.rm = TRUE)
IQR <- Q3 - Q1

# Remove outliers beyond 1.5 * IQR
lizard_data <- subset(lizard_data, `Average.Female.adult.weight..g.` >= (Q1 - 1.5*IQR) & 
                      `Average.Female.adult.weight..g.` <= (Q3 + 1.5*IQR))

# 1.6 Final Cleaned Data Summary
View(lizard_data)
summary(lizard_data)
str(lizard_data)
```
